body:
Thanks for your testing guide, I got it working, although gdb doesn't seem to want to play, it says:

```
gdb: Unable to get location for thread creation breakpoint: requested event is not supported
gdb: Unable to get location for thread creation breakpoint: requested event is not supported
gdb: Unable to get location for thread creation breakpoint: requested event is not supported
```

when I try to do anything. But at least I can reproduce the problem.  Are you really truly sure that it's that revision though? I think 3bf61fb2e53afaaec4386376c4d6e677767cfff4 is much more likely.
